Final bodies found after China's most serious earthquake in a decadeThe bodies of the two remaining people missing in the aftermath of China's most serious earthquake in nearly a decade were found on Sunday, a tragedy that has renewed concern over exposed populations in seismically active zones. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 07:01:58 GMT JEWSD2DZINJ27A6J5ER54QENHU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/final-bodies-found-after-chinas-most-serious-earthquake-decade-2023-12-31/Reuters世界中国
China Dec factory contraction deepens, more stimulus on the cardsChina's manufacturing activity shrank for a third straight month in December. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 02:10:10 GMT KEGTFRN6BVKTXMHHIJQXXYBMUQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-dec-factory-activity-shrinks-more-than-expected-bodes-ill-recovery-2023-12-31/Liangping Gao, Kevin Yao市场宏观问题
China's Dec factory activity contracted more than expectedChina's manufacturing activity contracted for the third consecutive month in December, an official factory survey showed on Sunday, as factories struggled with weak demand, clouding the outlook for the country's economic recovery. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 01:44:24 GMT ASRXGMFG7BIVVJR6VXNFSKOXKQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-dec-factory-activity-contracted-more-than-expected-2023-12-31/Reuters市场宏观问题
China calls Taiwan president frontrunner a destroyer of peaceChina's government called the frontrunner for Taiwan's next president "confrontational" and a destroyer of peace after he spoke at a presidential debate and said the island's sovereignty and independence belong to its people. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 01:25:53 GMT 5R5CRTRLWROU5IBLIPF5MZXII4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-calls-taiwan-president-frontrunner-peace-destroyer-2023-12-31/Reuters世界亚太地区
Warner set for Sydney farewell as Australia name unchanged squadDavid Warner has been given the hometown farewell from test cricket he craved after the opening batsman was named in an unchanged Australia line-up for the third and final test against Pakistan in Sydney next week. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 00:50:25 GMT EDMK6DOYJ5PNFKPKKN4UCTVV7E https://www.reuters.com/sports/cricket/warner-set-sydney-farewell-australia-name-unchanged-squad-2023-12-31/Reuters运动的蟋蟀
How China talked markets out of a run on the yuanInterviews with 28 sources show at least two dozen cases where regulators steered market participants through coordinated actions this year to resist pressure on the currency. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 22:04:38 GMT UVQJE7JBK5PZZBRPHY2M2JNRAI https://www.reuters.com/markets/currencies/how-china-talked-markets-out-run-yuan-2023-12-30/Reuters市场货币
